text: aur usee kee (qudarat kee) nishaaniyon mein se ek ye bhee hai ki vah tumako daraane vaala ummeed laane ke vaaste bijalee dikhaata hai aur aasamaan se paanee barasaata hai aur usake zarie se zameen ko usake paratee hone ke baad aabaad karata hai beshak aklamandon ke vaaste isamen (qudarate khuda kee) bahut see daleelen hain
